ygData.subject: Re: group tactics?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that here must be diferent group tactics what you need to use in base of wizard lv. Im now 15 lv. and i use many diferent tactics in base of other
ygData.messageBody:
I think that here must be diferent group tactics what you need to use in
base of wizard lv.

Im now 15 lv. and i use many diferent tactics in base of other group
membewrs, if we are group of casters highest lv will ROOT target ( be
careful that a other lower lv not try to root as they will make all further
savings at base of last root casted !! So if higest lv cast root all other
lower lv can concentrate on firing spells, as soon as monster moves again
you must cast root again by your highest caracter and he have a ruole to
kill a beast with last shot. It is important that a rooter is free of
monsters as life of others depend on his ability to root.

All for now next tactic soon

Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard
